description: Enterprise techniques used by SamSam, ATT&CK software S0370 (v1.1)
name: SamSam (S0370)

techniques.comment: [SamSam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0370) uses custom batch scripts to execute some of its components.(Citation: Sophos SamSam Apr 2018)
[SamSam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0370) encrypts victim files using RSA-2048 encryption and demands a ransom be paid in Bitcoin to decrypt those files.(Citation: Sophos SamSam Apr 2018)
[SamSam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0370) has been seen deleting its own files and payloads to make analysis of the attack more difficult.(Citation: Sophos SamSam Apr 2018)
[SamSam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0370) has been seen using AES or DES to encrypt payloads and payload components.(Citation: Sophos SamSam Apr 2018)(Citation: Talos SamSam Jan 2018)
[SamSam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0370) has used garbage code to pad some of its malware components.(Citation: Sophos SamSam Apr 2018)
